mapper.select: select rownum rno, nid, title, ndate, nhits, ncontent from(select nid, title, ndate, nhits, ncontent from pcp_notice order by ndate desc)
select nid, title, ndate, nhits, ncontent from pcp_notice where nid = #{nid}
select nid, title, to_char(ndate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') ndate, nhits, ncontent from pcp_notice where nid = #{nid}
mapper.insert: insert into pcp_notice(nid, title, ndate, nhits, ncontent) values('N_'||ltrim(to_char(sequ_pcp_notice_nid.nextval,'0000')),#{title},sysdate,0,#{ncontent})
mapper.update: update pcp_notice set title=#{title}, ncontent=#{ncontent} where nid=#{nid}
update pcp_notice set nhits = nhits+1 where nid = #{nid}
